name: Package.Dependency.Requirement
desc: An enum that represents the requirement for a package dependency.

items.name: static func upToNextMajor(from: Version) -> Package.Dependency.Requirement
items.desc: Returns a requirement for a version range, starting at the given minimum version and going up to the next major version. This is the recommended version requirement.

items.name: static func upToNextMinor(from: Version) -> Package.Dependency.Requirement
items.desc: Returns a requirement for a version range, starting at the given minimum version and going up to the next minor version.

items.name: static func exact(Version) -> Package.Dependency.Requirement
items.desc: Returns a requirement for the given exact version.

items.name: static func branch(String) -> Package.Dependency.Requirement
items.desc: Returns a requirement for a source control branch.

items.name: static func revision(String) -> Package.Dependency.Requirement
items.desc: Returns a requirement for a source control revision such as the hash of a commit.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.
